default.subject: Quick question about {business_name}'s online presence
default.body:
Hi there,

I came across {business_name} while researching {category}s in your area, and I wanted to reach out with something that might be helpful.

{seo_findings}

I specialize in helping local {category}s improve their online visibility and would love to chat about some quick wins we could implement to help you attract more customers.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call to discuss how we could help? No pressureâ€”just wanted to share what I found.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

restaurant.subject: Help {business_name} attract more diners online
restaurant.body:
Hi there,

I noticed {business_name} while looking at restaurants in the area. Your {category} looks great, but I spotted some opportunities to help you reach more potential customers online.

{seo_findings}

Many diners search online before choosing where to eat, and improving these areas could help you capture more of that traffic.

Would you be interested in a quick chat about how we could boost your online visibility?

Best regards

professional_services.subject: Increase online visibility for {business_name}
professional_services.body:
Hello,

I came across {business_name} and noticed some areas where we could help improve your online presence to attract more clients.

{seo_findings}

As a {category}, having a strong online presence is crucial for attracting new clients. I'd love to discuss some strategies that could help.

Would you be available for a brief call?

Best
